snippet: Despite being barred from soccer, Blatter will continue to receive his president’s salary from FIFA until a new president is elected on Feb. 26.
abstract: FIFA audit and compliance committee rules organization must continue to pay salary, but not bonuses, to suspended president Sepp Blatter until new president is elected; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Despite being barred from soccer, Blatter will continue to receive his president’s salary from FIFA until a new president is elected on Feb. 26.

headline.main: Sepp Blatter Will Remain on Payroll
